parameters.name: BackupGatewayId
parameters.description:
The ID of the backup gateway.

> - This parameter is required if **SourceEndpoint**.**InstanceType** is set to **agent**.
>
> - For more information about how to create a backup gateway, see [Add a backup gateway](~~93250~~).
>
> - You can call the [DescribeBackupGatewayList](~~2869840~~) operation to view the list of existing backup gateways.

parameters.name: BackupLogIntervalSeconds
parameters.description:
The interval for incremental backups, in seconds.

> This parameter is required only for **physical backups**.

parameters.name: BackupMethod
parameters.description:
The backup method. Valid values:

- **logical**: logical backup

- **physical**: physical backup

parameters.name: BackupObjects
parameters.description: The backup objects.

parameters.name: BackupPeriod
parameters.description:
The full backup cycle. Valid values:

- **Monday**

- **Tuesday**

- **Wednesday**

- **Thursday**

- **Friday**

- **Saturday**

- **Sunday**

> You can select multiple values. Separate them with commas (,).

parameters.name: BackupPlanId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup plan.

parameters.name: BackupPlanName
parameters.description: The custom name of the backup plan.

parameters.name: BackupRateLimit
parameters.description:
The network bandwidth throttling limit, in KB/s. The maximum allowed value is 10 GB.

> This parameter is valid only for MySQL physical backups.

parameters.name: BackupRetentionPeriod
parameters.description: The retention period for backup data, in days. Valid values: 0 to 1825. Default value: 730.

parameters.name: BackupSpeedLimit
parameters.description:
The disk I/O limit, in KB/s.

> This parameter is valid only for MySQL physical backups.

parameters.name: BackupStartTime
parameters.description: The start time for the full backup. The time is in the *HH:mm* format and is in UTC.

parameters.name: BackupStorageType
parameters.description:
The built-in storage type:

- Empty (default): Backup data is stored in your OSS bucket.

- system: Backup data is stored in the built-in OSS bucket of DBS.

parameters.name: BackupStrategyType
parameters.description:
The full backup strategy. Valid values:

- **simple**: periodic backup. Use this value with BackupPeriod and BackupStartTime.

- **manual**: manual backup.

> The default value is **simple**.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A client token used to ensure the idempotence of the request. This prevents duplicate requests.

parameters.name: CrossAliyunId
parameters.description: The UID of the Alibaba Cloud account for cross-account backup.

parameters.name: CrossRoleName
parameters.description: The name of the RAM role for cross-account backup.

parameters.name: DatabaseRegion
parameters.description: The region where the database is located.

parameters.name: DatabaseType
parameters.description:
The database type. Valid values:

- **MySQL**

- **MSSQL**

- **Oracle**

- **MariaDB**

- **PostgreSQL**

- **DRDS**

- **MongoDB**

- **Redis**

parameters.name: DuplicationArchivePeriod
parameters.description: The time after which backup data is converted to archive storage, in days. Default value: 365.

parameters.name: DuplicationInfrequentAccessPeriod
parameters.description: The time after which backup data is converted to Infrequent Access (IA) storage, in days. Default value: 180.

parameters.name: EnableBackupLog
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable incremental log backup. Valid values:

- **true**

- **false**

parameters.name: FromApp
parameters.description: The source of the request. The default value is OpenApi. You do not need to set this parameter.

parameters.name: InstanceClass
parameters.description:
The specification of the backup plan. Valid values:

- **micro**

- **small**

- **medium**

- **large**

- **xlarge**

> Higher specifications provide better backup and recovery performance. For more information, see [Specifications](~~84372~~).

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description:
The database instance type. Valid values:

- **RDS**

- **PolarDB**

- **DDS**: Alibaba Cloud MongoDB

- **Kvstore**: Alibaba Cloud Redis

- **Other**: A database connected over an IP address and port.

- **dg**: A self-managed database without a public IP address or port, connected through Database Gateway (DG).

parameters.name: OSSBucketName
parameters.description:
The name of the Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket.
Default: The system automatically generates a new name.

parameters.name: PayType
parameters.description:
The payment method. Valid value:

**prepay**: subscription

parameters.name: Period
parameters.description:
The billing cycle of the subscription instance. Valid values:

- **Year**

- **Month**

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: The region where DBS is available. To view the available regions, call the [DescribeRegions](~~2869853~~) operation.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointDatabaseName
parameters.description:
The database name.

> This parameter is required if the database type is **PostgreSQL** or **MongoDB**.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointIP
parameters.description:
The database endpoint.

> This parameter is required if **SourceEndpoint**.**InstanceType** is set to **express**, **agent**, or **other**.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointInstanceID
parameters.description:
The ID of the database instance.

> This parameter is required if **SourceEndpoint**.**InstanceType** is set to **RDS**, **ECS**, **DDS**, or **Express**.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointInstanceType
parameters.description:
The location of the database. Valid values:

- **RDS**

- **ECS**

- **Express**: A database connected through a leased line, VPN Gateway, or Smart Access Gateway.

- **Agent**: A database connected through a backup gateway.

- **DDS**: Alibaba Cloud MongoDB

- **Other**: A database connected directly over an IP address and port.

- **dg**: A self-managed database without a public IP address or port, connected through Database Gateway (DG).

parameters.name: SourceEndpointOracleSID
parameters.description: The Oracle system ID (SID). This parameter is required if the database type is Oracle.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointPassword
parameters.description:
The password for the database account.

> This parameter is optional if the database type is **Redis**, or if the database location is **agent** and the database type is **MSSQL**. In all other cases, this parameter is required.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointPort
parameters.description:
The database port.

> This parameter is required if **SourceEndpoint**.**InstanceType** is set to **express**, **agent**, **other**, or **ECS**.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointRegion
parameters.description:
The region where the database is located.

> This parameter is required if **SourceEndpoint**.**InstanceType** is set to **RDS**, **ECS**, **DDS**, **Express**, or **Agent**.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointUserName
parameters.description:
The database account.

> This parameter is optional if the database type is **Redis**, or if the database location is **agent** and the database type is **MSSQL**. In all other cases, this parameter is required.

parameters.name: StorageRegion
parameters.description: The storage region.

parameters.name: StorageType
parameters.description: This parameter is not yet available.

parameters.name: UsedTime
parameters.description:
The subscription duration. Valid values:

- If **Period** is set to **Year**, the value of **UsedTime** can be 1 to 5.

- If **Period** is set to **Month**, the value of **UsedTime** can be 1 to 11.
